original_info.id: Teletubbies: Go! Exercise with the Teletubbies_1998
original_info.name: Teletubbies: Go! Exercise with the Teletubbies

review.name: Well, it's the Teletubbies, what do you expect?
review.reviewBody:
Yeah, if you're an adult, or even a kid over five, this thing is dreadful.

But hey - it's not aimed at you. It's aimed at your 3 year old. And he loves it! God knows why Everything you need to know about the movie is right there in the title. Dipsy, Tinky Winky, Laa-Laa and Po .... dancing. For an hour. Aaarrrggghhhh.

What's worse, your 3 year old loves it so much, he 'll want to see it over and over again :) So if you truly love your kid, and are prepared to go through any sort of pain to make him happy, buy him this video. If you like your kid, but aren't going to go through hell for him ... leave well alone ;)
